text:
Yo Jangid!
One of the purest soul of our wing. A guy who always wished good for others. You have always been there whenever I needed any help, be it in Udghosh Hospi or anything. Late-night discussions with you have always been fun. And even in this pandemic you always join the wing VCs irrespective of the time‚ù§
Stay the same bro and keep in touch always.
PS: Our elder brothers share the same first name (Random fact)
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo sinha sir!!
The Ambani of our wing. Tere sath Valo sessions humesha kaafi mazedar rahe hain. Third year me kya sahi room decorate kiya tha tune apna. 
Second year me POR Jod the bhai tu. Astro club se leke photography club har jagah secy. Ecell ki party me kaafi maze kiye the. And you have been always our unofficial photographer (thanks to One+)
Kaafi chill banda hai tu, humesha available to talk. 
Firtst year me we used to play Loco and then used to transfer through GPay to get cashbacks üòÇ
Knowing you, tu kabhi bhi time pe nahi aayega kisi bhi event me :p Har baar wait karawaya hai.
Lucknow me thoda aur milte hain. Photowalk me bahut maze aaye the bhai saath me.
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Ananto !!
I will always remember you as the "work hard and party hard" guy. The way you stood up in F2 was legendary. First year me humesha doubts batane ko taiyar rehte the bro. And tumhari branch change ke baad Batti courses me kami lagi tumhari. 
I can never forget your birthday celebration at OAT and then dancing in the wing until seniors came to shut our party down. You have always been an interesting guy to talk to. 
Also thanks for the "Paris Darshan". Video call pe Eifel tower dikhaya :p Aaj bhi video call ka SS saved hai.
You have been the kind of guy who was always enthusiastic to hang out with the wing, and have always been the front runner in all the fun episodes. Be it EDMs or Holi Party you have always been there with the wing. 
Never knew that car ride to home/station with you would be the last time we'd be meeting as college students.
Stay the same bro. Hope to meet you real soon!
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
One of the most chaaapu and fun loving guys of our wing! 
Bro your enthusiasm is legendary. You have been the one who is always down to do something entertaining. Kabhi bhi wing video call ki baat kro toh tu humesha aata hai. First year me Ecell party me mast maze kiye the saaath me. Those wing pubg sessions with you were so much fun, lucifer. Tere saath discussion sessions were so fun. Ashu ke room pe saath me bakchodi me bahut maze aate the. And those sticker fights!!!
Tera "Toh" wala incident toh kaafi funny tha. 
You are one of those guys jisko 10 saal baad bhi bina soche call kar paunga because you are so reliable and helpful. 
PS: Keep in touch and do keep on supplying us with latest gossips.
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo JJW!
From Fortnite to Valo you have come a long way. You have always been the quiet and knowledgeable guy. Tera flipkart plus kaafi use kiya hai sabne :p
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Repi!
Tere tinder escapades toh har jagah famous hain. And teri sketching... omg.
Insta pe mast content daalta hai tu bro. I still remember that day when you put deodorant on fire, creating different characters and all. Also that day jab tum aur Bibhu ek dusre ko uthane ka try kr rhe the first year me, that is itched in my memory üòÇ
Hope we meet again bro!
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Saini bhai ‚ô•
‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§´ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§≤‡•ã‡§ó ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•á ‡§ü‡§æ‡§á‡§Æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•á‡§ï‡§ø‡§® ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Æ‡•ã‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡•õ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡§æ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§≤‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§â‡§®‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§ó‡•Å‡•õ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§π‡§∞ ‡§™‡§≤ ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶‡•ã ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§¨‡§∏ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§  
Over these four years, we might not have met a lot but I can definitely the memories made with you are some of the most cherished ones. 
The first year Saini was the most out-going and joking chhapri nibba, I had ever met. B6-C6 wali bonding, those Mini Militia games and teri harkate were all too fun. Your hairstyle and hair accessories were soo famous :p 
I still remember celebrating your birthday in the canteen during the first year winter break. Also that NSS painting drive when we were just sort of busy taking pictures :p
Second-year Saini was the most dedicated person that I saw. Your dedication towards Robo Club was amazing. I still remember that late-night discussion about Robo Club Marketing where you told me about your plans for the club. 
Third-year Saini was just so different, you gained so much maturity (though still a chhapri nibba :p) Third year Saini was ke saath sabse zyada maze kiye- be it sharing Techkriti BT or discussing our issues. Devendra-Piyush ke room pe aake bakchodi karna, pizza khana were all part of this fun. Btw the wall art in your room was just awesome bro.
PS: Remember that one time when Drunk Saini almost pulled my pants in the corridors üòÇüòÇ
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Ashu Bhai!!
The oldest (or second oldest) member of C6. Wing me sabse mature aur chill banda hai bhai tu. C6 me koi bulla bole toh Ashu ka room yaad aata hai. Tere room pe kitne maze kiye hain bhai. Tere ko pehli daaru pilayi hai bhai meine :p
Teri GPL lene me humesha maze aaye hain. Tere sath political debates me kya hi maze aate the. Let's hope jald hi fir milen aur saath me daaru party karen.
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Finance!
You have wonderful art skills. I still remember during first-year you used to record charcoal drawing and other paintings. Keep in touch bro!
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
O ma Bebo :-*
Sabse mast aadmi of my college life. Jiske saath masti bhi bahut ki aur seekha bhi bahut kuch. 
First Impression: Big Guy from Odisha, probably killed a few people before, who goes to canteen A LOT.
Can't forget tera Philosphy padhana mujhe xD. Second year me tujhe roommate banae ke liye almost lad hi liya tha mein. And I am glad. Tere saath din-raat gossips, ghar ki stories, aur mazaks sabme bahut maze aate the. You are probably one of the very very few people who have seen me cry in college. You have been someone jisse sab khulke share kiya hai meine. Tere se life ke baare me bahut seekha mein. Tujhe shayad na pata ho but tere random gyans have helped me a lot to grow up. 
Tere saath PUBG khelna (Ping968 <3) was/is so much fun. Esp bcoz you are a pro gamer. Be it cards or any shooting game.
Can't forget that day jab teri lab miss ho gayi thi. üòÇ
You will definitely go places, bro. You are one of the most hardworking and dedicated (not to mention brilliant) guy I know. 
For me, you would always be the big burly guy who is very mature of his age and pure by heart.
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Janeman!!
Our group's leader in crime!

First year me tu Raghav ka roomie tha tab dekha tha tujhe bas utna hi interaction tha. Fir Gupta tereko Udghosh me laya tha..... And uske baad toh jo saath rahe hain hum log üíì

Udghosh ke kya hi din the bhai wo! Second year me hospi desk sambhalna subah subah, raat me pange handle karna aur din bhar bhagana... kya hi din the wo. Also, Fraudy Fest Team, kya hi, maze kiye the humne sabke saath me.

Uske baad Teckhriti bhi saath me sambhali apan ne (Although tu kisi aur ko sambhal rha tha fest me üòú) 
First year me room pe baithe rehne wala banda dekhte hi dekhte Fests ka Majdoor ban gaya. Koi bhi kaam ho, koi bhi situation ho sabko handle karne me expert. 

In sab ke beech me kab itne close aa gaye pata hi nhi laga. Poore summers saath me mess jaate the. And those late night walks and ice-creams would remain some of the best memories of my campus experience. 

Techkriti ko na jaane kis kis unchai tak le jaane ke khayal the apne!! Had the pandemic not struck, you'd have surely taken it to that level bro! TOSC me teri mehnat is exemplary.

Mere 90% daaru experience me tu included raha hai... Tere saath kitne hi maze kiye hain bhai parties me! I still remember Hidden Lounge wala experience... waha bhi tune hi sambhala tha hum teeno ko üòÇ

Poore lockdown me jitni baate ghar pe nahi ki usse zyada tum dono se ki hain üòÇ

Our Goa trip was sooooo awesome.... Thanks for handling me that night üôÉ Teri driving skills ka first-hand experience mil gaya waha pe. 

I am always worried about you bro kyunki I am pretty sure teri bail karwane toh hume hi aana padega üòõ

Tere saath hone pe I know I can act all careless and befikr, because kuch bhi hoga tu handle kar lega and you'll be there to take cover my back. 
Ab iske aage nahi likh rha kuch, tu ro dega. 
Milte hain jald hi!
author: Archit  Awasthi

text: Chhote Saini ka khayal rakhna üòù
author: Archit  Awasthi

text: 3 Harami Forever!
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Chaapu Dancer!
First year me alag hi dedication ke saath dance practice me jaata tha tu bhai. And we used to go watch the show because Gavish hai usme. 
My very first memory of you: On our very first GBM when DoSA asked all the students to leave if they were not comfortable and people started moving out, you were the one who asked us to keep sitting there. Although kafi fati hui thi fir bhi baith gaye the there saath.
This pandemic made our bond stronger, partly because during regular time you were almost never in your room :p 
I really enjoyed playing PUBG with you guys. That used to be one of the most entertaining things during early pandemic. Fir PUBG ban ke baad Psych, Among Us bhi try kiya tha. üòÖ
Also thanks for helping me out in CHM and MSE course. Tere bharose hi kiye wo courses. I never had to study in those bcoz I knew you were there to cover us. 
Also your advice to shout "ùêæ‚Ñéùëéùëê‚Ñé ùêæ‚Ñéùëéùëê‚Ñéùëéùëü ùêæ‚Ñéùëéùëê‚Ñéùëéùëü ùêªùë¢ ùêªùëé ùêªùë¢ ùêªùëé" right before the start of interviews, really came handy. (I can't believe I am writing it, but it really brought down the anxiety levels xD)
Thank you being there bro. Accha aadmi hai tu. Stay the same (and meet us more)
author: Archit  Awasthi

text: Girish Sharma, apne wing ki sabse buland awaz. Wing me sasbko jab tu bulata tha bhai kya mast entry hoti thi teri ek dum chillate hue. Tu ek aisa banda hai jo wing ke bahar bhi full involve hua aur wing me bhi sabke saath rha. Jald hi ab tu naam roshan karega wing ka UPSC me. Tere baare me sabse acchi baat: Dosto ke liye humesha taiyyar rehta tha tu. Aage bhi aise hi rahio. Aur bhul mat jaio kabhi humko. ‚úå
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
The introvert twin!
You are one of the most sincere and hardworking guy I have ever met. Thanks for being there in CHM201. Stay the same bro!
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Jay Bhai !!
Apan Kota se jaante hain ek dusre ko. Mera poora 11th tere bagal me baitha hua nikla hai. Kitna seedha banda tha tu tab (sirf dikhne me). Har time bas padhta tha. Tere aur Akshat ke saath bahut maze kiye, be it VKT ki mimicry karna ya KW ko sunana. Fir tu Star me chala gaya. Isliye kabhi kabhi dikhta tha. But fir bhi milna ho hi jaata tha. 
IITK me bhi saath hi saath aaye hum log (literally). First year me tu Brach Change me laga rha aur mein fests me. 
Uske baad toh Satyam ke karan hua milna, cricket khelna aur DoAA me milna. Tu zyadatar time waise toh busy hi rehta tha SnT me. But mujhe jab bhi koi help chahiye hoti thi toh mein teko hi text karta tha because I knew koi bhi info chahiye toh Jay ke pass hogi. You were my "I know a guy who knows a guy" üòõ
TOA1 wali annual pizza party pichle 2 saal se nahi ho pai, kabhi karte hain kisi dusri city me. üòÇ
Wo OAT pe Akshat ko prank karne gaye the wo toh mast hi scene tha. Ulta backfire kar gaya plan. :p

I don't need to say ki yaad rakhna bhai, milte rahenge etc etc because I know you are always just a call away. Kitna bhi busy ho, kitna bhi door ho tu you'll always be down for some bulla session and be there to help us out. 
Aur haan hum bulate the tu nhi aata tha üòë
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Asli bhai hai tu. Mini Militia, PUBG se lekar cards tak sabme pro player. Tere se sikha ki kaise magai aur maze me balance banake chalna hota hai. Tu bhale hi age me kam tha but kaafi mature hai. Teri birthday party toh BEST thi. Pata hi nhi laga kab baccha bada ho gya xD. Tera room toh party room hi ho gya tha. 
Udghosh-Techkriti me saath me hospi me nhi hota tu toh ghanta kuch ho paata. Second year me just saamne room tha tera kabhi bhi ghus jao, humesha open. Tere se baat karke humesha accha lagta hai. 
Aise hi call karke touch me rehna bro. Keeping it family-friendly here :p
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Bhai!
It was super fun working with you during Udghosh. Tera dedication towards Aerial Robotics is God level bro. Let's hope we get to meet in future and I hope I can take some shooting tips from you then :p
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo bhai!
Meri labs toh tune paar lagwai hain. Be it lab me result jugaadna ya report arrange karna. Aur tere ultimate connections jo har batti exam me pass karwate the. Kafi mast time raha hai bhai. Second year me sutta maarte hue common chhat pe humesha dikhta rehta tha :p
Tere saath B6-C6 Joint GPL me toh alag hi maza aaya hai. Stay in touch bhai.
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Nimish!
You may look big and tough from the outside, but I know you are very sensitive and caring for your friends. Your dance tutorial during Odessey was legendary. You are one of the few guys who were never afraid of trying new things and I am pretty sure that will take you places!
Be it wing parties or cricket matches your enthusiasm was what kept the wing going. Let's hope we get to party together soon.
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Gupta urf Repi urf Lambi Ganthe!

Poore char saal me itne moments share kiye hain humne, jagah kam pad jayegi likhne me. Although I can just sum it up in one line also : "Bhai hai tu"

First year me bagal ki hi wing me tha tu, but mile hum log Udghosh aur Pankaj ki kripa se. Fests ke naam pe aisa dosti hua jaise ek _________  (aage ka sentece apne aap bhar lena :p) 

Techkriti se leke Udghosh ki hospi saath me sambhalne me maze hi aa gaye the bhai. Although we hought we were working, but actually we were making memories. First year me Biswa ke show ke liye special entry, Teams ke saath liye hue pange sab kaafi memorable rahe hain. We were never trying to learn about fests but itne zyada involved ho gaye ki har cell ki baat aur kaam pata hota tha. 

First year me Pankaj-Rajat ke room pe bakchodi karna, chhat pe jaake baate karna, random discussions, Techkriti me bulla session, <censored> sab fav memories me se hain. Ek bar Fest ke kaam ke beech tereko chaabi di thi ki room se saman le aaye tu mere, 10 in baad tu tuti hui chaabi leke aata hai üòÇ

Our late night walks were so epic... Bas ek round aur karte karte na jane kitne chakkar laga liye. Aur uske baad ice cream bhi saara fat wapas gain karne ke liye.

Second year summers me kaafi maze kiye apan ne, be it jenga khelna, fest ki planning karna, Devnedra ke maze lena, tera deodrant waste karna, tere room pe harkate karna sab kaafi mazedar the. OAT pe tera bday celebrate karna aur fir teri GPL kya hi maze aaye the bhai.

Saath me Hidden Lounge jana (bina bag/bottle ke üòÇ) would always remain the funniest trip ever. Also tere bina ek bhi daaru party nahi ki hai meine. Mere har daaru experience ka hissa raha hai tu. 

And thanks to you, Goa was awesome! Thanks for all those scooty rides :p But bc teri capacity kam ho gayi hai ab.

All our discussion calls are so much fun, let's hope we keep them up even with our jobs.
Tere se ek shikayat humesha rahegi ki tu cheeze batata nhi hai. But I know I can never be upset/angry/frustrated with you because even if you don't tell me, you'll always be there to take care of things for me and will always be there to cover my back.

PS: You'll go places bro! Tere level ka dedication self-improvement ka maine shayad hi kisi me dekha ho. Tera 'No fucks' attitude is amazing bhai... 5 courses me fakke ke baad Day 1 placement, 7 CPI se graduate shayad hi koi kar paye. I have seen you work hard for these things and achieve the result and I am pretty sure whichever field you'll go in future you'll surely work your way to the top. Talking to you and Devendra motivates me to strive for success. 
3 Harami Forever!
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Raghav Bro!!
We have soo many memories together and words can't express how grateful I am to have you here with me. All those late-nighters which started with "Raat bhar me kar lenge" and ended with "Bhai subah 6 baje jaga dena tab padh lunga" are some of most cherished memories. Those throughout the day poker sessions, were the highlight of our third year. 
Saath me mess jaane se lekar saath me lab jaane tak, you were always there. IITK me tere saath sabse zyada cheese explore ki hain meine. Wo Shivratri pe mandir jaana and room pe songs pe dance karna... Saari random bakchodi aur discussions sab bahut yaad aate hain ab.
Tere TInder Tips ke next episode ka wait hai. The first 2 episodes were awesome :p
I still remember Antaragni me jab tu bhand hoke (almost) kaand kiya tha. Kya mast time the wo!
First year me guitar ke saath photoshoot ke alag maze the. Tera gym aur music enthusiasm alag hi level hai. 
Oh and how can we ever forget Numerical Analysis. Proxy pakdi gayi thi aur fir prof se mile bhi nhi hum dhang se :p
The best part about you is ki tujhe kuch bhi bata du tu kabhi judge nhi karta and humesha openly cheeze bata deta hai. Teri ye No BS personality is amazing bro.
My only regret is ki hum kabhi saath me hand nhi hue. Yaad hai Goa me raat me tu humare appt aaya tha üòÇ
Thanks for always checking up on me, and reaching out to me now and then. And I know whenever I want to talk to someone, you'll always be there for me. 
All the best for your future endeavours!
author: Archit  Awasthi

text: Yo Roomie! Tu mera sabse pehla roomie tha life me. Pehli baar ghar se bahar nikla and tere se seekha ki kaise chill rehte hain. Kitni bhi tension ho, kaise aram se rehte hain. Soo many memories shared with you... Balloon fulana kamre me.... Mini Militia Nights.... College life me first roommate influences your aage ki journey and I am glad I got you as a roommate. Tu kabhi bhi apne acche kaamo ka credit nhi leta. Let's hope aage aur bhi patte khelenge kabhi. Shaadi me bulana mat bhulna :p
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Mote!
2-2 naam wala aadmi :p
Kota se jaanta hu tujhe. Bada hi mast aadmi hai tu. IITK ke first day pe jab pata laga ki hum wingie hain kaafi khushi hui thi. Tab se ab tak lekar we have had soo many things in common. 
Same coaching, Same college, same branch, same wing, same gaming team, same courses failed and same company me job.  (Ab zyada ho rha xD)
Our 'mutual friend' count over FB is a testimony to our friendship. 
Volleyball se leke Cricket tak sabhi game mast khelta hai tu bro. Acads me toh chaapu hai hi. 
My acads would not have been this way without you. You were my go-to study partner. Short notes banana tere se hi seekha hai. All those late night study sessions, which always ended with subah 6 baje jaga dena bhaiüòÇüòÇ
That Summer of Code project broo.... Kya hi fraud maara tha humne and us prof ne effort ki dhajjiyan uda di :(
Wo PE me jaake ma'am se raaat ki permission lena, thanks a lot bhai uske liye. NSS me kaafi kaam kiya humne saath me :)
Ping 968 ke games were so epic. Har time khelte rehte the hum log. Pubg to Poker to Valo sab kuch saath me khela hai. 
Cheers to all the BTs we have faced together!
PS: Always remember I was the one who introduced you to alcohol :p
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Raju aka NotAnEzTargt xD!
One of the most entertaining guy of our wing. First year me B6 me "ragging" lena aur Anuj/Bibhu ke sath epic fights were all too much fun. Also you were senior's favourite in our wing :p
Second year me tune party badal li thi üò™ From PUBG to Valo pro player kaafi badla gaya tu.
You were my go-to guy for this pandemic placement session. Resume se lekar tests tak sab tere saath discuss kiya. Stay the same boi. Let's hope job ke time bhi touch me rahenge asie hi.
author: Archit  Awasthi

text: TMKC <3
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Ladies and cheems, introducing you the youngest member of C6, the one who never wears half-shirt, A* in ESC and LIF, Fakka in MTH, Vietnam intern, sole admin of our wing group, most loved senior of some, greatest memer, controversy brewer, unofficial Festi of fests, Institute PUBG League Chairman, moderator of IIM the great Shobhit Sachan. *Drum Rolls*

Bhai mein tera example deta hu jab bhi talented logo ki baat krte hain. Tera transformation meine apne saamne dekha hai. First year me aaya hua banda jo pehle kafi kam baat kr pata tha ab mast convo carry karta hai.  You started programming aur ESC me A* le aaye. Explore krte krte kitne saare projects kr diye that you had to remove some of them from your resume :p. You started playing PUBG, and you literally (Ace)d it there. 
Everything that you tried, you have aced. And I am pretty sure ki aage jaake tu jis bhi chees me jayega you'll find your way to the top. I say that not only because you are talented but because you are fearless. Jaha hum log darr ke alag ho jaate the, you have been the 'Jo hoga dekha jayega' types.

Sorry to have ditched you at the bus stand :p Humesha regret rahega uska xD
You are the guy jo humesha wing calls me join karta hai. Wing ko aise hi connected rakhna bro.
You are the guy jiske saath college ke baad bhi kabhi touch nhi chutega.
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Siri!
Kya haal chaal? I can't believe this is the same Sireesha that I am writing the memoir for, that I met in 2nd year. We first met for the Udghosh interviews. Poore Udghosh me you were the sincere and innocent one. Never knew kab tum humare group ka hissa ban gayi. Udghosh ke time toh kaam ki hi baaten ki humne. Fir uske baad interaction start hua jab saath me padhne library jaate the. 

Raat bhar Library/NCL me padhna aur fir DoAA me chai is one of my favourite memories. Raat me padhne ke baad long walks, discussing about our future plans, politics, and random stories me kitna maza aata tha. Monika aur Bhupi ke saath academic area me kitne hi ghanto time pass kiya hai humne. MABS is a very special part of my college journey. Too many chais involved. Hum sabka raat me walk karna aur canteen se Lala Maggi laake HC ke saamne baith ke khaana. Kitne fun times the. Also Hall 4 aur Hall 10 ki canteen jaake ghas pe baithke khaana. 

Devendra, Piyush ke saath movie dekhne jana bahar khaana khaane jaana sab kitne bhadiya times the. Upar se tumhara mere room pe aake padhna kyunki apne room me man nhi lagta tha tumhara. 
I hope ab Birayani aur Chicken ke alawa bhi kuch khaati ho. Kabhi mile toh badminton khelte, jaise OAT road pe khelte the.  

Kitni saari fun memories hain saath me hum sabki: Room pe poker khelna, Monika ko station pe drop krne jaana, raat me paaglo ki tarah ghumna, sis wale uncle ke saath baith ke aag sekna, DoAA ki maggie, Hall 12 ki biryani,  OAT rooftop pe raat me baithke gappe ladana sabke saath, Lockdown me sabke saath video calls aur Ludo khelna. 

Also, I would like to take this opportunity to remind you about the incident when you called that doctor "khadoos". Epic scene tha yaar üòÇüòÇ
Tumhare injection ke dar ko toh sab jaante hi hain, I still get chills remembering the first time I took you for blood test. Itne bade bade aasnsu üòÇ

But truly tumhara transformation dekh ke bahut khushi hoti hai, from a girl struggling with acads and no outside interaction, you transformed yourself into a bold and independent person. I hope aage bhi aise hi khud ko strong banye rakho aur khud ko improve karte raho. Milte hain kabhi Hyderabad me.
Also thanks for all the keychains and cups (that although were not meant for me but came back to me üòë)

PS: What is with three emojis that you send everytime?
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Yo Sunit!
One of the most enthu wala banda of our wing. Someone who always worked hard to achieve success in life. You have always been the explorer type. I still remember first year me health issues ke karan ghar jaana pada tha but you covered the time lost. I will always remember you as the chill guy who made wing gatherings more fun. Keep in touch bro!
author: Archit  Awasthi

text:
Hi Umang!
I can never thank you enough for being there. You have always been my go-to guy. Koi bhi problem ho ya kuch suggestion chahiye ho mujhe humesha I know I can reliably turn towards you. Your work ethics have always inspired me. Kaafi chill wala banda hai tu, and bahut hi rare instances me kabhi gussa hua hai.
Wing ka Tech God rha hai tu humesha se. Laptop se lekar mouse lene take sab tere se aake pucha hai meine.
I am happy that we got to share so many memories together. Antaragni PR (paise wapas nhi kiye unhone :p) me saath me kaam kiya tha sabse pehle. Kaafi fun times the wo. Also first year me wing ke saath EDM jaana. Oh and your Euphoria wala dance üòç
Odessey Treasure Hunt, Takneek aur SnT code me kya hi maze kiye hain bhai. Saath me questions solve krne ka try karna.... kitne mazedar moments the wo.
DSA ke question se lekar Valorant tak har jagah you have been the one carrying me.
One thing that I am super proud of you about was your SCD profile. Although deleted, original copy mere pass abhi bhi padi hui hai :p
And that one time you commented on a YT channel (thanks for that, I was secretly happy for that :p)
You have been one of those guys who was always up for group video calls. Those late-night video calls and discussion sessions are some of the most cherishable memories. 
You were an integral part of my placement journey bro. From the silliest doubts to the most challenging problems you were always there to guide me. 
Our PUBG and Valorant sessions have been legendary. Ping968 ka Miramar match kabhi nhi bhul sakta hu.

First-year me star gazing to third-year me next-door-roomie, it has been a truly amazing bonding, at least for me. From canteen trips to mess trips, from discussing politics to life experiences, from participating in treasure hunts to pubg rank push, from waking up for breakfast to late-night skribble games, it has been really fun times. 

Cheers to many more memories and amazing friendship! Looking forward to more trips in future with you boi.
author: Archit  Awasthi
